query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Market uptake initial steps
result.description: Based on the Market uptake strategy outline (D7.5) and the exploitation plan outcome (D7.6), this deliverable will define the service offer of a dedicated entity for exploiting REScoopVPP tools for specified countries and markets together with the operational and management structure of such a body.

result.title: First Policy and market recommendations
result.description: The consortium will generate recommendations regarding policy/regulation as well as market structures in order to create a friendlier environment for the adoption and wide replication of REScoopVPP solution in particular in the context of energy communities. This first version will be the opportunity to address open questions, compare countries legislation and introduce SRI considerations.

result.title: Information management and security
result.description: This report will describe the measures taken to secure the system, both from the perspective of data protection/information management and general information security. It will also describe how the system can be audited in order to meet compliance and standards in information management/security.

result.title: Users review report V1
result.description: Deliverable 23 or the Users review report will describe the feedback received from the Users after integration and testing of the NextLand products and services Three updates of the report are foreseen linked with the yearly development cycle of the services A first version of the report will be delivered at T12 and will describe the feedback of the Alpha Users on the beta version of the services later updates at T24 and T34 will concern version 1 and final release of the provided services and will also include feedback of the Beta Users
